module.name: geometric_tolerance
module.purpose: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the definition of geometric tolerances.

inscope.li: datums targets whose shape is a point, line, circle or rectangular area.

uof.name: Geometric_Tolerance
uof.description: The Geometric_Tolerance UoF specifies the data structures for the definition of geometric tolerances.

aa.refpath: circular_runout_tolerance <= geometric_tolerance_with_datum_reference <= geometric_tolerance <- tolerance_zone.defining_tolerance[i] tolerance_zone <- tolerance_zone_definition.zone tolerance_zone_definition => runout_zone_definition runout_zone_definition.orientation -> runout_zone_orientation runout_zone_orientation.angle -> measure_with_unit [measure_with_unit.value_component] [measure_with_unit.unit_component]

component datums are referenced at different material conditions
